text: The monument in 2018 The Veterans of Foreign Wars Monument, also known as To All Who Have Served, is a monument installed outside the Oregon Department of Veterans' Affairs building in Salem, Oregon, United States.https://digital.osl.state.or.us/islandora/object/osl%3A26132/datastream/OBJ/view The memorial features a soldier atop a globe. File:Salem, Oregon (2018) - 081.jpg|Plaque ==References== Category:Monuments and memorials in Salem, Oregon Category:Outdoor sculptures in Salem, Oregon Category:Sculptures of men in Oregon Category:Statues in Oregon
title: Veterans of Foreign Wars Monument
